name: Type of attachment
description: Identifies the kind(s) of [[[Attachment]]] allowed to be sent in answer to the question.

element.formal: Identifies the kind(s) of [[[Attachment]]] allowed to be sent in answer to the question.
element.comments: This extension only has meaning if the question.type = Attachment.

binding.name: MimeType
binding.description: The mime type of an attachment
